Name: Sumiyoshi Taisha
Description: 2-chōme-9-89 Sumiyoshi, Sumiyoshi Ward, Osaka, 558-0045, Japan • ⭐ 4.5 (12399 reviews) • http://www.sumiyoshitaisha.net/ — Historic seaside shrine to pair with Osaka aquarium morning.
Notes: Sunrise visit before crowds; ideal on 18 Nov workday morning.

Name: Osaka Museum of Housing and Living
Description: Japan, 〒530-0041 Osaka, Kita Ward, Tenjinbashi, 6-chōme−4−２０ 大阪市立住まい情報センタービル 8F • ⭐ 4.2 (7776 reviews) • https://www.osaka-angenet.jp/konjyakukan/ — Walk-through Edo-period Osaka streets under one roof.
Notes: Slot on 21 Nov midday if weather turns.

Name: Kyoto International Manga Museum
Description: 452 Kinbukichō, Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto, 604-0846, Japan • ⭐ 4.2 (6195 reviews) • https://kyotomm.jp/ — Floor-to-ceiling manga archive with reading lounges.
Notes: Great fallback if rain hits on 17 Nov.

Name: teamLab Borderless
Description: Japan, 〒106-0041 Tokyo, Minato City, Toranomon, 5-chōme−9−９ Azabudai Hills Garden Plaza B, B1 • ⭐ 4.6 (24696 reviews) • https://www.teamlab.art/jp/e/tokyo/ — Next-gen digital art in Azabudai Hills for extended Tokyo stay.
Notes: Hold as optional Monday night alternative if Disney crowds spike.

Name: Namba Yasaka Shrine
Description: 2-chōme-9-19 Motomachi, Naniwa Ward, Osaka, 556-0016, Japan • ⭐ 4.4 (12235 reviews) • https://nambayasaka.jp/ — Lion-head stage perfect for photo op en route to Dotonbori.
Notes: Add on 15 Nov after Ebisubashi lights.

Name: Nakameguro Canal Walk
Description: Nakameguro, Meguro City, Tokyo 153-0061, Japan — Boutique-lined canal walk, pretty even without cherry blossoms.
Notes: Morning coffee crawl option on 23 Nov before Ghibli.
